reviewText: Wish this was formatted for Region 1.  I watched this in the 70's on PBS in DC area. Absolutely transfixing.  I would stand in my kitchen in front of the refridgerator with the little TV on top of it and be spellbound. Great story with great actors.  Took in the war across the British Empire, the rich part of the family, the poor part of the family, class differences, family dynamics. Super!
